--- interval.sql
SELECT
  -- Single datetime part
  INTERVAL 1 YEAR,
  INTERVAL -5 DAY,
  INTERVAL 90 SECOND,
  INTERVAL 1 QUARTER,
  INTERVAL 6 WEEK,
  INTERVAL 25 HOUR,
  INTERVAL 1500 MINUTE,
  INTERVAL 90000 SECOND,
  INTERVAL 90 MINUTE,
  INTERVAL -25 MONTH,
  INTERVAL -90 MINUTE,
  INTERVAL @param YEAR,

  -- Datetime part range
  INTERVAL '2-11' YEAR TO MONTH,
  INTERVAL '2-11 28' YEAR TO DAY,
  INTERVAL '2-11 28 16' YEAR TO HOUR,
  INTERVAL '2-11 28 16:15' YEAR TO MINUTE,
  INTERVAL '2-11 28 16:15:14' YEAR TO SECOND,
  INTERVAL '11 28' MONTH TO DAY,
  INTERVAL '11 28 16' MONTH TO HOUR,
  INTERVAL '11 28 16:15' MONTH TO MINUTE,
  INTERVAL '11 28 16:15:14' MONTH TO SECOND,
  INTERVAL '28 16' DAY TO HOUR,
  INTERVAL '28 16:15' DAY TO MINUTE,
  INTERVAL '28 16:15:14' DAY TO SECOND,
  INTERVAL '16:15' HOUR TO MINUTE,
  INTERVAL '16:15:14' HOUR TO SECOND,
  INTERVAL '15:14' MINUTE TO SECOND,
  INTERVAL '10:20:30.52' HOUR TO SECOND,
  INTERVAL '1-2' YEAR TO MONTH,
  INTERVAL '1 -15' MONTH TO DAY,
  INTERVAL '1 5:30' DAY TO MINUTE,
  INTERVAL '-23-2 10 -12:30' YEAR TO MINUTE,
  INTERVAL '-0-2 10 0:30' MONTH TO MINUTE,
  INTERVAL '-30:10' MINUTE TO SECOND

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Results: []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.IntervalLiteral{
          Interval: 35,
          Expr:     &ast.IntLiteral{
            ValuePos: 44,
            ValueEnd: 45,
            Base:     10,
            Value:    "1",
          },
          Unit: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 46,
            NameEnd: 50,
            Name:    "YEAR",
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.IntervalLiteral{
          Interval: 54,
          Expr:     &ast.IntLiteral{
            ValuePos: 63,
            ValueEnd: 65,
            Base:     10,
            Value:    "-5",
          },
          Unit: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 66,
            NameEnd: 69,
            Name:    "DAY",
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.IntervalLiteral{
          Interval: 73,
          Expr:     &ast.IntLiteral{
            ValuePos: 82,
            ValueEnd: 84,
            Base:     10,
            Value:    "90",
          },
          Unit: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 85,
            NameEnd: 91,
            Name:    "SECOND",
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.IntervalLiteral{
          Interval: 95,
          Expr:     &ast.IntLiteral{
            ValuePos: 104,
            ValueEnd: 105,
            Base:     10,
            Value:    "1",
          },
          Unit: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 106,
            NameEnd: 113,
            Name:    "QUARTER",
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.IntervalLiteral{
          Interval: 117,

            ValuePos: 126,

          Interval: 272,

            Atmark: 281,
            Name:   "param",
          },
          Unit: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 288,
            NameEnd: 292,
            Name:    "YEAR",
          },

            NameEnd: 1117,

          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.IntervalLiteral{
          Interval: 1121,
          Expr:     &ast.StringLiteral{
            ValuePos: 1130,
            ValueEnd: 1138,
            Value:    "-30:10",
          },
          Unit: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 1139,
            NameEnd: 1145,
            Name:    "MINUTE",
          },
          UnitTo: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 1149,
            NameEnd: 1155,
            Name:    "SECOND",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT INTERVAL 1 YEAR, INTERVAL -5 DAY, INTERVAL 90 SECOND, INTERVAL 1 QUARTER, INTERVAL 6 WEEK, INTERVAL 25 HOUR, INTERVAL 1500 MINUTE, INTERVAL 90000 SECOND, INTERVAL 90 MINUTE, INTERVAL -25 MONTH, INTERVAL -90 MINUTE, INTERVAL @param YEAR, INTERVAL "2-11" YEAR TO MONTH, INTERVAL "2-11 28" YEAR TO DAY, INTERVAL "2-11 28 16" YEAR TO HOUR, INTERVAL "2-11 28 16:15" YEAR TO MINUTE, INTERVAL "2-11 28 16:15:14" YEAR TO SECOND, INTERVAL "11 28" MONTH TO DAY, INTERVAL "11 28 16" MONTH TO HOUR, INTERVAL "11 28 16:15" MONTH TO MINUTE, INTERVAL "11 28 16:15:14" MONTH TO SECOND, INTERVAL "28 16" DAY TO HOUR, INTERVAL "28 16:15" DAY TO MINUTE, INTERVAL "28 16:15:14" DAY TO SECOND, INTERVAL "16:15" HOUR TO MINUTE, INTERVAL "16:15:14" HOUR TO SECOND, INTERVAL "15:14" MINUTE TO SECOND, INTERVAL "10:20:30.52" HOUR TO SECOND, INTERVAL "1-2" YEAR TO MONTH, INTERVAL "1 -15" MONTH TO DAY, INTERVAL "1 5:30" DAY TO MINUTE, INTERVAL "-23-2 10 -12:30" YEAR TO MINUTE, INTERVAL "-0-2 10 0:30" MONTH TO MINUTE, INTERVAL "-30:10" MINUTE TO SECOND
